snippet: A man arrested Saturday with explosives at Midland International Airport is an Army-trained demolitions expert and member of the elite Green Berets who served in Afghanistan.
abstract: Trey Scott Atwater, Army-trained demolitions expert and member of the elite Green Berets who served in Afghanistan, is arrested with explosives at Midland International Airport in Texas.
lead_paragraph: A man arrested Saturday with explosives at Midland International Airport is an Army-trained demolitions expert and member of the elite Green Berets who served in Afghanistan.

headline.main: Texas: Man Detained at Airport Is a Green Beret
headline.print_headline: Texas: Man Detained at Airport Is a Green Beret
